page.title: 09SHOPPING IN HELSTON
page.content: {Helston}is a busy shoppiong centre. There are 90 shops in the two main streets, Meneage Street and Coinagehall Street. Of these 20 sell food, 16 sell clothes and 5 sell stationery. There are shoe shops, furniture shops, iron mongers and chemists. In fact, it is possible to purchase anything from a piano to a wet suit in Meneage Street. We are encouraged to invest our money in either the 4 building societies or the 5 banks. There is a choice of 5 hairdressers, two dental surgeries, a chiropodist and an optician. The shopping arcade in Coinagehall Street opened in 1983, giving Helston another 20 small shops. On Saturdays and Mondays there is an open air market of about 10 stalls in Coinagehall Street, which adds to the atmosphere of our market town.
